html:
• Daily deals

The best Black Friday deals on Beats headphones and earbuds are now live. You can get many Beats headphones and earbuds at their lowest prices ever.

Even Beatsâ€™ flagship headphones â€” the Beats Studio Pro â€” are available with a big $100 discount, making them a great alternative to other premium headphones.

This post contains affiliate links. Cult of Mac may earn a commission when you use our links to buy items.

Black Friday is a great time to pick up a pair of Beats earbuds or headphones. Almost all popular Beats offerings are available with big discounts of up to 50%.

Table of contents

  • Beats Black Friday deals
    • Beats Solo 4: Save a whopping 50%
    • Beats Studio Buds: Get the best for less
    • Beats Studio Pro: The best Beats for less
    • Beats Solo Buds: Even more affordable
    • Beats Pill: Save 33% on the portable speaker

Beats Solo 4 headphones: Save a whopping 50%

Apple launched the Beats Solo 4 headphones in April, eight years after the Beats Solo 3 arrived. The headphones pack 40mm transducers to deliver exceptional sound quality. Even better, you can enjoy lossless audio streaming over USB-C and the 3.5mm jack.

Another highlight of the headphones is support for personalized Spatial Audio, giving you an immersive audio listening experience.

With a claimed battery life of $200, thereâ€™s little to dislike about the Beats Solo 4. If you found the $200 price tag a bit too steep, Amazonâ€™s Black Friday deal takes a massive 50% off the headphones, dropping the price to just $100. For this price, the headphones are a steal, especially for the features it packs.

  • Beats Solo 4: $100 ($100 off) ðŸ”¥

Beats Solo 4

Successor to the Beats Solo 3, the Solo 4 packs significant upgrades over its predecessor to deliver even better sound quality and comfort.

Pros:

  • Long battery life
  • Spatial audio support
  • Lossless audio streaming over USB-C

Beats Studio Buds: Get the best for less with these Black Friday deals

Beats Studio Buds are Appleâ€™s best wireless earbuds if you want compatibility with both Apple and Android devices. The earbuds come with 8.2mm drivers in an IPX4-rated design.

Beats says you can get up to eight hours of listening time, which can be extended by up to 24 hours using the charging case.

Beats Studio Buds retail for $150, but this Black Friday, you can get them for just $80 after a massive 47% discount.

If you donâ€™t mind spending a bit extra, get the Beats Studio Buds+. This model packs a new acoustic architecture to deliver even better sound quality. While not an AirPods Pro 2 challenger, the earbuds are a solid option if you need both Android and iPhone compatibility.

For Black Friday, Beats Studio Buds+ is on sale for $130 after a 24% discount.

  • Beats Studio Buds: $80 ($70 off)
  • Beats Studio Buds+: $130 ($40 off)

Beats Studio Buds +

The Beats Studio Buds+ stand out for their translucent design, while delivering impressive sound quality thanks to Beats' custom acoustic platform.

Pros:

  • Compatible with Android and iPhone
  • Useful transparency mode

Cons:

  • No wireless charging
  • No EQ customization

Beats Studio Pro: Get the best Beats for less

Beatsâ€™ flagship headphones, the Beats Studio Pro, bring an almost AirPods Max-like experience for less. They sound noticeably better than their predecessors, the Beats Studio 3, and support Spatial Audio for an immersive listening experience. The Studio Pros wonâ€™t rival the best headphones models from Sony and Bose in terms of sound quality, but they still sound decent.

Beats Studio Pros typically retails for $350. Thatâ€™s a bit too steep, considering the headphones fall short of their competitors in some key areas. But with a 29% Black Friday discount, you can get them for a more reasonable price of $250.

  • Beats Studio Pro: $250 ($100 off) ðŸ”¥

Lightweight with solid sound

Beats Studio Pro noise-canceling headphones

Beats' flagship over-ear headphones feature personalized Spatial Audio, USB-C lossless audio and up to 40 hours of battery life.

Pros:

  • Lossless wired audio capability
  • Apple and Android compatibility
  • Available in multiple colors

Cons:

  • Lacks ear-detection sensors
  • No Apple H1 or H2 chip

Beats Solo Buds: Even more affordable

Solo Buds are one of Beatsâ€™ most affordable pairs of earbuds. Despite being inexpensive, they offer decent sound quality and up to 18 hours of battery life. Plus, a quick 5-minute top-up provides an extra hour of playback time.

The tiny earbuds typically cost $80, but with this Black Friday deal, you can get them for $50 after a 38% discount.

  • Beats Solo Buds: $80 ($30 off)

Beats Solo Buds

The Beats Solo Buds delivers 18 hours of battery life and works with Android and iPhone. Its carrying case is also the smallest ever designed by Beats.

Pros:

  • Affordable
  • Long battery life
  • Super small charging case

Cons:

  • Limited features
  • Charging cable is not bundled

Beats Pill: Get Beats portable Bluetooth speaker with 33% off

Beats reintroduced its iconic Beats Pill portable speaker earlier this year with a complete design revamp. It features an IP67 water-resistant design and houses a bigger woofer that helps provide deeper bass with room-filling sound. You can also pair two Beats Pill speakers together for extra loudness.

This is backed by an impressive claimed battery life of up to 24 hours.

For $150, the Beats Pill is an impressive portable Bluetooth speaker. A 33% discount makes it even better, dropping its price to $100.

  • Beats Pill: $100 ($50 off) ðŸ”¥

Beats Pill (2024)

Beats revived its portable Bluetooth speaker lineup with the launch of the Beats Pill this year. Featuring a new IP67-certified design, the Beats Pill sounds better than its predecessors and lasts a lot longer too.

Pros:

  • Great sound quality
  • Good battery life
  • Great value for money at discounted price

Cons:

  • No adjustable EQ
  • No NFC for quick pairing
